channel.title: Pkg Config on I Am Going to Forget These
channel.description: Recent content in Pkg Config on I Am Going to Forget These

item.title: I Am the Cure!
item.description: If you encounter such an error during the configure state of a package: ./configure: line foo: syntax error near unexpected token `something,' ./configure: line bar: `PKG_CHECK_MODULES(something, libsomething)' that means pkg-config is not installed.
